constitutional_law.name: Constitutional Law
constitutional_law.description: Fundamental principles establishing the structure of a government and the relationship between the government and citizens

separation_of_powers.name: Separation of Powers
separation_of_powers.description: Division of governmental authority among different branches

federalism.name: Federalism
federalism.description: Division of power between national and state governments

individual_rights.name: Individual Rights
individual_rights.description: Fundamental rights and liberties protected from government intrusion

common_law.name: Common Law
common_law.description: Law developed through judicial decisions rather than legislative statutes

stare_decisis.name: Stare Decisis
stare_decisis.description: Principle of following precedent in judicial decisions

case_law.name: Case Law
case_law.description: Body of law created by judicial precedent

equity.name: Equity
equity.description: Principles of fairness used to supplement strict rules of law

legislation.name: Legislation
legislation.description: Process of making or enacting laws

codification.name: Codification
codification.description: Process of collecting and arranging laws systematically

statutory_interpretation.name: Statutory Interpretation
statutory_interpretation.description: Process of determining the meaning of statutory language

administrative_law.name: Administrative Law
administrative_law.description: Law governing the activities of administrative agencies

rulemaking.name: Rulemaking
rulemaking.description: Process by which agencies create regulations

adjudication.name: Adjudication
adjudication.description: Process by which agencies resolve disputes

criminal_law.name: Criminal Law
criminal_law.description: Law related to crime and punishment

mens_rea.name: Mens Rea
mens_rea.description: Mental state required for criminal liability

civil_law.name: Civil Law
civil_law.description: Law dealing with disputes between private parties

property_law.name: Property Law
property_law.description: Law governing ownership and use of property

jus_cogens.name: Jus Cogens
jus_cogens.description: Peremptory norms that cannot be violated

procedural_law.name: Procedural Law
procedural_law.description: Rules governing legal process and proceedings

evidence.name: Evidence
evidence.description: Information used to establish facts in legal proceedings

jurisdiction.name: Jurisdiction
jurisdiction.description: Authority of a court to hear and decide cases

authoritarianism.name: Authoritarianism
authoritarianism.description: System where individual freedoms are subordinated to the state

executive_supremacy.name: Executive Supremacy
executive_supremacy.description: Concentration of power in the executive branch

limited_judicial_review.name: Limited Judicial Review
limited_judicial_review.description: Restricted ability of courts to check government power
